name: andrew_
text: I was given to understand that bras could help ladies with crummy boobs.

name: mikebox
text: Note the tourniquet on her arm.

name: jackparsons
text:
Note the arm that looks like rubber draped on the ground.

Alt-text: Sorry to all my crummy-boobed readers

text: and the gnarly track marks on the arm.

name: tronwell
text:
Crummy boobs?
Tourniquet on her arm?
Gnarly track marks?
Dear.God.I.Am.Not.A.Religious.Man.But.Please.
Help.Me.See.The.Connection.Here

name: tourach3
text:
marijuana is only referred to as "dope" by old people such as mr hand
to most people, dope is heroin (or possibly meth, depending on the area)

name: rainwolfj
text: Down south here I believe dope is heroin, but I'm not too down with drug culture.

name: madnes
text: Dope is heroin in most places and at most times.

name: i_love_kate
text: Doping just refers to taking drugs in general though, right?

name: rainwolfj
text:
WRONG!

Sort of...

name: gormster
text: I have never heard of anything but weed referred to as dope. Heroin has a lot of names, smack, horse, H, but not dope. Though I must agree, the only people who call it that are from the 1970s.

name: aki
text: The modern usage is dope, as in "a low-bottom dope fiend"; one who is using heroin and having a rough time of it.  Dope was popular as a reference to cannabis mostly through the 60-70's, petering out in later years save for with the generation that was exposed to the drug culture during that time (baby boomers and before).  Weed on the other hand seems to have about as many names or more than any other drug under the sun: bud, chronic, kb, nugget, sensi, herb, dro, mary jane, smoke, dank, trees, ganja, sticky-icky, grass, pot, cheeba....  Plus like anything sold, legally or otherwise, there are 'brand' names as well, strains of weed or different packages of her-on...it's marketing wherever you go.

name: omegatron
text: Wow, I did not know that. That is so dope, bro!

name: dissembly
text: Me neither. This conversation was the first time i'd encountered the concept of Heroin being referred to as dope, and I do not travel in soley tea-totalling circles. I think it must be partly an American thing.

name: dusty
text: It probably doesn't matter because most dealers specialize, and if they don't they can probably tell which one you mean by how fast you ask for it.

name: fancypants
text: Chubby for the comment-icon synergy

text: That's still called a touriquet.  You squeeze the arm to cut off the blood flow both for bleeding and for doping purposes.

text: Sometimes getting pregnant does wonderful things to boobs.

name: splendorr
text:
Stretch marks are in the eye of the beholder.

And they won't come out.

text:
Improved for a while, maybe. Like, nine months max.

Ultimately, however, the situation is a lot like that Paula Abdul, MC Scat Cat collaboration...2 steps forward, 3 steps back.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: If I ran into a man with teeth scabs, I'd be pretty scared myself.

name: saint
text: that man is my grandpa.

name: terriblerobot
text: Hoooly fuck that made me shudder. I...I'm not sure if I want to know what teeth scabs look like.

text: philippe is not living up to his expectations. He seems more grown up in this strip. Tell those junkies off little man!

text: This is so against the idea of 'don't talk to starngers', because here we have a small child acting like a dick to some helpless strangers...

text: not just any small child, but a small child with a wicked sack

name: fosters

text: Who knows, maybe Ramses Smuckles was just like Phillipe when he was younger.

text: Man, you guys's avatars are basically identical, in form and shape. Which I guess makes sense, since the first guy is wearing glasses that remind me of Spider Jerusalem, and the aforementioned is a futuristic take on Hunter S. Thompson.

text: You are incorrect.

name: anzio
text: I see.

name: tekende
text:
See?

Sorry. Not trying to be a dick or anything.

name: anzio
text: Oh... I see for real now. You see, when he mentioned that before, I was thinking of the guest strip where Phillipe and Little Nephew had grown up and made poor life decisions, but it turned out to be a dream. I had actually completely forgotten about that strip that Onstad had made. Thanks for linking me to that. I smile at you.

text: An understandable mistake!

text: 5th Panel: Is that Junkie Julia ?

name: heavymetaljesus
text: The Wino Messiah.

name: baryonyx
text:
AND the LORD PHILEPPE did look down upon the junkies and the huffers and the winos and the bums, and he was displeased, and did say unto them:
Thou SHALT NOT bear scabs upon thy teeth, for that is neither scary nor dangerous, and an abomination;
Thou SHALT wear a bra, even if thy boobs art crummy, for so sayeth EVERYONE and so sayeth I.
And he did abandon them to their eternal squalor, for he sought the Couch.

text: I would just like to add that my first couch was brown and I loved it dearly. I did not, however, brave the Transfer Station on its behalf.

text: I just realized that Philippe's staff has a cord coming out the bottom of it, and is most likely therefore a part of a lamp.  This has really made the strip speak to me.
